response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. Given its high-quality features and capabilities, it's valued at $10,000 by you, which aligns perfectly with its true worth. To make this opportunity even more enticing, I am offering you the chance to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $9,500. This special offer is designed to ensure you receive exceptional value while allowing us to share the benefits of our innovative solution. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
